text: It is one of only seven years to use just one Roman numeral. The seven are 1 AD (I), 5 AD (V), 10 AD (X), 50 AD (L), 100 AD (C), 500 AD (D), and 1000 AD (M). == Events == *Possible date for the Battle of Mons Badonicus: Romano- British and Celts defeat an Anglo-Saxon army that may have been led by the bretwalda Aelle of Sussex (approximate date; suggested dates range from 490 to 510) Note: This battle may have influenced the legend of King Arthur *Possible date at which Fergus I of Dalriada begins his reign *Approximate beginning of the Heptarchy period in the history of England *Approximate year of the founding of the Kingdom of Essex *Emperor Xuanwu of Northern Wei China becomes sovereign of the Northern Wei Dynasty *Uxmal founded (approximate date) *Traders from southern Arabia settle in northern Ethiopia
